InstructionData.Title: Air Conditioner
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: alias GasSensor d0​ alias Cooler1 d1​ alias Cooler2 d2​ alias Cooler3 d3​ alias Cooler4 d4​ alias Cooler5 d5​ alias pwm r0​ alias current r1​ alias error r2​ alias lastError r3​ alias integral r4​ alias target r5​ move target 294.15​ move integral 0​ move lastError 0​ #s Valve Maximum 0​ s Cooler1 Setting 100​ s Cooler1 On 0​ s Cooler2 Setting 100​ s Cooler2 On 0​ s Cooler3 Setting 100​ s Cooler3 On 0​ s Cooler4 Setting 100​ s Cooler4 On 0​ s Cooler5 Setting 100​ s Cooler5 On 0​ start:​ yield​ l current GasSensor Temperature​ sub error target current​ add error error -0.1 # bias​ sub r8 error lastError # derivative​ move lastError error​ add integral integral error​ mul r6 5 error # kp​ mul r9 0 r8 # kd​ mul r7 0 integral # ki​ add pwm r6 r7​ add pwm pwm r9​ mul pwm pwm -1 # invert​ s db Setting pwm​ min pwm pwm 100​ max pwm pwm 0​ slt r9 0 pwm​ s Cooler1 On r9​ slt r9 1 pwm​ s Cooler2 On r9​ slt r9 2 pwm​ s Cooler3 On r9​ slt r9 3 pwm​ s Cooler4 On r9​ slt r9 4 pwm​ s Cooler5 On r9​ j start
